bib.title: Annotation of epidemiological information in animal disease-related news articles: guidelines
bib.author: Sarah Valentin and Elena Arsevska and Aline Vilain and Valérie De Waele and Renaud Lancelot and Mathieu Roche
bib.abstract: This paper describes a method for annotation of epidemiological information in animal disease-related news articles. The annotation guidelines are generic and aim to embrace all animal or zoonotic infectious diseases, regardless of the pathogen involved or its way of transmission (e.g. vector-borne, airborne, by contact). The framework relies on the successive annotation of all the sentences from a news article. The annotator evaluates the sentences in a specific epidemiological context, corresponding to the publication of the news article.
